questions.answer: What type of cyber attack involves tricking people into clicking malicious links, like a fisherman using bait to catch fish?
questions.question: What is phishing?

questions.answer: This phishing technique targets high-level executives with personalized attacks, like a con artist researching their mark before the big scam
questions.question: What is whaling?

questions.answer: Like a fake store that looks real but steals your credit card, this phishing method creates fraudulent websites that mimic legitimate ones
questions.question: What is pharming?

questions.answer: This social engineering technique involves calling someone pretending to be tech support, like a wolf in sheep's clothing on the telephone
questions.question: What is vishing?

questions.answer: Like sending a fake pizza delivery to get someone to open their door, this phishing variant uses text messages to deliver malicious links
questions.question: What is smishing?
